attributes.additional_details: Knife crime and violent crime statistics 'milk-shaking of veteran, abuse in care homes, issues.of societal integration that plagues the news and creates tension.
attributes.background: Having seen the disrespect of people for ex-servicemen who risked their lives to maintain freedom and democracy. Further disintegration of moral values. Instil discipline giving people social skills and practical skills to take up a meaningful positive role in society.
